nodes.text: Sliblis was a male individual who served in the Galactic Empire's navy aboard the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Ravager during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, the Ravager was stationed with much of the Empire's loyalist forces at the planet Jakku. Sliblis's brother, Mervais Gandor, a pilot in the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, was also stationed at Jakku aboard the bulk freighter Yadeez. The pair spoke over hologram and wept as they exchanged stories.
Sliblis was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
